attributes.title: Introducing Tales from the Stinky Dragon
attributes.caption: Our brave adventurers have answered the call...to be interns for the super hero group, the Infinights! Little do they know that the Infinights are in danger and our hapless interns may be their only hope for salvation.
attributes.description:
Our brave adventurers have answered the call...to be interns for the super hero group, the Infinights! Little do they know that the Infinights are in danger and our hapless interns may be their only hope for salvation. Can the interns save the Infinights AND master a triple shot vanilla almond latte with extra foam?  Find out in "Tales from the Stinky Dragon"! 

Subscribe now at https://link.chtbl.com/stinkydragon or wherever you find podcasts!
attributes.display_title: Introducing Tales from the Stinky Dragon

attributes.title: Welcome to Boulderay - Ep. 1
attributes.caption: Four brave adventurers begin a journey to Boulderay in order to join the illustrious Infinights. Do they have what it takes to get in?
attributes.description:
Four brave adventurers begin a journey to Boulderay in order to join the illustrious Infinights. Do they have what it takes to get in?

Visit the Rooster Teeth Store at http://store.roosterteeth.com !

Download the audio version: https://bit.ly/3efnKgX

attributes.title: The Search for Dr. Ahem Pt. 1 - Ep. 2
attributes.caption: Mayor Prattle tells our heroes that one key witness knows what happened to the Infinights. But before they can figure out next steps, the mayor is taken! Can our heroes rescue him or will they be stopped in their tracks by their first puzzle....doors!
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3eAf98C. Mayor Prattle tells our heroes that one key witness knows what happened to the Infinights. But before they can figure out next steps, the mayor is taken! Can our heroes rescue him or will they be stopped in their tracks by their first puzzle....doors!

Follow us on Social! https://linktr.ee/TalesFromTheStinkyDragon
attributes.display_title: The Search for Dr. Ahem Pt. 1 - Ep. 2

attributes.title: The Search for Dr. Ahem Pt. 2 - Ep. 3
attributes.caption: The Infinight Interns attempt to solve the door puzzles- included but not limited to a sleepy dragon, a monster with a cleaning problem, and an adorable bloodstained teddy bear.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/33Ok2Vw. The Infinight Interns attempt to solve the door puzzles- included but not limited to a sleepy dragon, a monster with a cleaning problem, and an adorable bloodstained teddy bear. Will they find Mayor Prattle and Dr. Ahem or will they become mince meat first?
attributes.display_title: The Search for Dr. Ahem Pt. 2 - Ep. 3

attributes.title: The Search for Dr. Ahem Pt. 3 - Ep. 4
attributes.caption: The interns have entered a curious chamber with two unknown captives, multiple mysterious mechanisms, and an illusive enemy in the shadows. Will they rescue the hostages before it’s too late? Or will they become captives themselves?
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3bQKB0y. The interns have entered a curious chamber with two unknown captives, multiple mysterious mechanisms, and an illusive enemy in the shadows. Perhaps the infamous Paralyte? Will they rescue the hostages before it’s too late? Or will they become captives themselves in this looming laboratory?

Follow Us On Social: https://linktr.ee/TalesFromTheStinkyDragon

Check out one of our other podcasts: Good Morning From Hell! https://linktr.ee/GoodMorningFromHell
attributes.display_title: The Search for Dr. Ahem Pt. 3 - Ep. 4

attributes.title: Taverns, Tomes, & Training - Ep. 5
attributes.caption: The Interns are tasked with some R&R, leading half of them to the local tavern and half of them to the local school library. It's always fine when you split the party, right?
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3uyhtSB. The Interns are tasked with some R&R, leading half of them to the local tavern and half of them to the local school library. It's always fine when you split the party, right? 
Meanwhile, Dr. Ahem has been working on some actual training to make up for his mishaps....but will the interns live up to his expectations? 

Follow Us On Social: https://linktr.ee/TalesFromTheStinkyDragon

Visit the Rooster Teeth Store at http://store.roosterteeth.com

attributes.title: Pyous Pass Pt. 1 - Ep. 6
attributes.caption: The Interns are sent on their first actual mission! Tasked with exploring the dustbowl town of Pyous Pass, they meet several of the locals: Pyes, a race of humanoid mantis' that are dealing with a mysterious curse.
attributes.description:
The Interns are sent on their first actual mission! Tasked with exploring the dustbowl town of Pyous Pass, they meet several of the locals: Pyes, a race of humanoid mantis' that are dealing with a mysterious curse. 
Download the audio version: https://bit.ly/3z4BnrT

attributes.title: Pyous Pass Pt. 2 - Ep. 7
attributes.caption: The Interns are caught in the middle of small town law: Sheriff Guv has arrested the beloved Mother Abby and the townspeople want her saved!
attributes.description:
The Interns are caught in the middle of small town law: Sheriff Guv has arrested the beloved Mother Abby and the townspeople want her saved! Mudd gets a haircut and a show, Kyborg jumps rooftops, and it's time for a prison break. What could go wrong?

Follow Us On Social: https://linktr.ee/TalesFromTheStinkyDragon
Download the audio version: https://bit.ly/3pUonAP

attributes.title: Pyous Pass Pt. 3 - Ep. 8
attributes.caption: The Interns are close to unraveling the mystery behind the Crypt-Curse. Stuck in a jail cell with a zombie and closing in on Sheriff Guv and Mother Abby, what outcome awaits the party? Find out in the finale to the Infinight Interns Arc!
attributes.description:
The Interns are close to unraveling the mystery behind the Crypt-Curse. Stuck in a jail cell with a zombie and closing in on Sheriff Guv and Mother Abby, what outcome awaits the party? Find out in the finale to the Infinight Interns Arc!

attributes.title: Between the Tales
attributes.caption: Gus and the players talk about the story so far, the decisions and backstory for their characters, and what they chose leveling up. That's right, the Infight Interns are Level 3!
attributes.description:
Gus and the players talk about the story so far, the decisions and backstory for their characters, and what they chose leveling up. That's right, the Infight Interns are Level 3!
